description: Define duplicate-version API contract for finalize: HTTP 409 + stable error code + friendly message
Update registry-v2 finalize version upsert path to enforce strict immutability (reject existing version regardless of hash)
Remove/disable duplicate-version branch that currently appends a new bundle hash to an existing version
Map DB unique-constraint races for (registry_id, version) to the same friendly duplicate-version 409 response
Ensure ext-bundles/finalize route and server action return consistent duplicate-version error payloads for UI and CLI callers
Update installer/publish UI flow to surface duplicate-version message directly to users
Add registry query/action to list all versions for a registry extension in tenant context
Include in version list payload: version string, created/published timestamp, latest content hash metadata
Include installed marker in version list payload by joining tenant_extension_install.version_id
Handle legacy version rows with multiple bundles by deterministically selecting latest bundle metadata in viewer payload
Render read-only Versions section in Extension Details page
Versions table shows columns Version, Published, Content hash, Installed
Versions section includes explicit empty state when no versions exist
Enforce existing permission checks for version listing (extension read scope)
Add tests for duplicate-version friendly response in both direct duplicate and race-condition paths
Add tests for strict immutability guaranteeing no new bundle rows are created when version already exists
Add tests for versions viewer backend query covering installed marker and legacy multi-bundle versions
Add UI tests for Extension Details versions section rendering, sorting, and empty state
